Uses of Class
math.Mat4

  • Packages that use Mat4 
    Package Description
    math
    Provides basic mathematical components for computer graphics: 2-, 3, 4- dimensional vectors, 3- and 4-dimensional matrices and Quaternions
    renderer
    Provides Render engines implementing the graphical interface.
    scenegraph
    Provides classes for all scene graph components: cameras, lights, geometries, materials, colors with all their attributes.
    scenegraph.util

      Vec3 Vec3.transform​(float w, Mat4 mat)
      transforms this vector (expanded with fourth component w) by a given 4x4 matrix M
      this = M * this', this' is the extended vector This method can be used to transform points (w=1) or vectors (w=0)
      static Vec3 Vec3.transform​(Vec3 vec, float w, Mat4 mat)
      transforms a vector v by a given matrix M
      v' = M * v
      Vec4 Vec4.transform​(Mat4 mat)
      transforms the vector v by a given matrix M
      v = M * v
      static Vec4 Vec4.transform​(Vec4 vec, Mat4 mat)
      transforms a vector v by a given matrix M
      v' = M * v
